reporting-org.narrative: Norad - Norwegian Agency for Development Cooperation

title.narrative: Information to enhance the transparency and accountability of conflict prevention and resolution by the UN Security Council

description.narrative: Support of a program that will advance the transparency, effectivenss and accountability of the UN Security Council. The project consists of monthly publications providing analytical information based on the programme of work of the Council every month. It includes briefs on all of the agenda items expected to be under Council consideration and offers balanced impartial information on these issues, including expected Council action, recent developments, key issues and options, sanctions and human-rights related developments and Council dynamics. More equal access to high quality information allows member states to press for better decisions from the Security Council. Information on SCR's website provides prospective elected members from developing countries with the means to prepare for their time on the Council. SCR's main consumers are countries engaged in multilateral activities, particularly, those that do not have the research capacity to follow the Council's work directly.These countries make frequent use of SCR’s publications and reports in shaping their positions at the UN. The target group includes UN member states, particularly developing countries, and NGOs in developing countries. Other consumers are UN Secretariat staff and UN personnel in the field. The most relevant sustainable development goal for this project is SDG 16, which refers to the promotion of “peaceful and inclusive societies” with “access to justice for all” and “effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels". Consistent, impartial and transparent data from independent research institutes increase the reliability of the measurement of the targets and enhance the legitimacy of the SDG monitoring process. Such tools also enable scholars, civil society organizations and other actors to monitor the implementation of SDG16.

title.narrative: QZA-20/0260 - Information to enhance the transparency and accountability of conflict prevention and resolution by the UN Security Council
